name: Human Environmental Animal Team
description: The Human Environmental Animal Team is committed to making a difference in all areas of service. Our foundation on the three pillars of human welfare, environmental conservation, and animal care shows our desire to be as flexible as possible in assisting our community. We will bring a positive approach to any organization that aligns itself with our values, as we hope to collaborate and assist any and all groups that support our varied causes. H.E.A.T. will champion diversity, opening our arms to anyone interested in helping our campus and our community.
